name: Studio Glam Only
description: Delivering seamless, long-lasting and velvet finish glam at our studio for your parties, birthdays, shoots etc.
A trial will make you come back!
extraCharges: Appointments outside our working hours {before 9:00am and after 4:00pm} attracts an EXTRA CHARGE of N10,000
Delay attract an extra charge of N5,000 per 30mins
terms: NO GELE included
Please note that a reservation doesn't confirm booking. Payment validates booking.
Automatic cancellation where payment isn't received within an hour.

name: Church/Nikkah/White Wedding
description: Delivering seamless, long-lasting and velvet finish Bridal glam on your big day.
We can't wait to be on your glam team!
workingHours: WORKING HOURS: Minimum Call Time is 6:00am. Appointment outside our call time attracts N10,000 extra.
extraCharges: NO GELE included {Kindly contact us to refer you to a professional gele artist}
This covers 2 outfits only.
This covers Reception Touch up (3 hours count immediately after bridal glam).
This rate applies to only LAGOS brides. Travel fee applies for Destination/ Out of state weddings. Estimation is based on mileage (distance).
terms: Please note that a reservation doesn't confirm booking. Payment validates booking.
50% Deposit is required. Please endeavor to make balance payment before (advisable) or on the day.
Automatic cancellation of reservation where payment isn't received within an hour.
